title: Ticket #1598: using qedit to update periodic* exprs on running jobs.
description: It would be advantageous to be able to update the periodic* expressions using qedit, currently it is not allowed. A couple ideas have been passed around, one possible solution is to allow for an explicit push schedd->shadows of elements which have +UpdateExprs in their submission file.
remarks: See #1790
